com.mumfrey.liteloader.update

Class UpdateSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.update.UpdateSite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Long>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LiteLoaderUpdateSite

    public class UpdateSite
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Long>
    An update site, used by liteloader to check for new versions but is also available to mods who may want to use a similar system.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpdateSite

        public UpdateSite(java.lang.String updateSiteUrl,
                  java.lang.String jsonFileName,
                  java.lang.String targetVersion,
                  java.lang.String artefact,
                  long currentTimeStamp,
                  java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Long> timeStampComparator)
        Create a new UpdateSite with the specified information
        Parameters:
        updateSiteUrl - Base URL of the update site, should include the trailing slash
        jsonFileName - Name of the json file on the remote site containing the version data, eg. versions.json
        targetVersion - The target minecraft version
        artefact - Artefact name in the form "com.somedomain.pkg:artefactname"
        currentTimeStamp - Timestamp of the current artefact
        timeStampComparator - Comparator to use for comparing timestamps, if null uses built in comparator

      • UpdateSite

        public UpdateSite(java.lang.String updateSiteUrl,
                  java.lang.String jsonFileName,
                  java.lang.String targetVersion,
                  java.lang.String artefact,
                  long currentTimeStamp)
        Create a new UpdateSite with the specified information
        Parameters:
        updateSiteUrl - Base URL of the update site, should include the trailing slash
        jsonFileName - Name of the json file on the remote site containing the version data, eg. versions.json
        targetVersion - The target minecraft version
        artefact - Artefact name in the form "com.somedomain.pkg:artefactname"
        currentTimeStamp - Timestamp of the current artefact
